column5: Just a heads up.... The lifetime guarantee socks are on sale thru 10/19 at Bass Pro for $9.99 per pair (reg. $14.99), limit 4 pairs.  A good sock presently at a good price!  Burt
Those are very nice Marino wool socks, Not as heavy as bps but Costco 4 pack for $12 Marino wool socks are an awesome deal  for every day use
Damm, road trip I guess, they always make great stocking stuffers.
Picked up 2 pairs today and exchanged one pair, which lasted 4 years. With lifetime warranty these are awesome socks for fall and ice fishing.
still curious about this lifetime warrant thing. Is that my life time or the products.

While I was doing an exchange I watched a guy bring in 3 or 4 pairs of the socks that were worn out (don't know if you need a hole or what) and they just told him to go and get the new ones.... no receipt or anything.  Burt

still curious about this lifetime warrant thing. Is that my life time or the products.  LOL   I want to know why ,,,,,,,,,,  Costa  exchanged one pair,???????   UNREAL   I have 2 pairs of wool socks that are 10-15 years old. Hand wash and air dry and still keep my toes toasty warm.
Brian,  I had only one pair before this day. Now I have 3 2 for me and a pair for my wife. I hope they will last at least another 4 years.

They will replace them no questions asked, no reciept, any time.  I do an annual fall run and replace 7 pairs, no questions asked. I wear a pair every day, all winter long.  Great socks. Warm, and durable.  S.
Here's the commercial that our very own (unstoppable) TJ did in 2009.
